@travispeltz or you can use http://twitrpix.com.  we've been vocal on the ToS debacle thats going around http://bit.ly/lE3v8i

text: @PhotoOomph we just commented on your blog post (very informative).  Hope more people become aware of ToS.  Thanks for posting it.
@PhotoOomph the last part of line is "for suitable display on the Site".  :)
@PhotoOomph The only rights granted to us is to display your photos as part of our service.  Our ToS clearly states that.
@admiraliphone hi. we saw you asked if there was any service where you still retained ownership.  We were saying yes.  :)
@admiraliphone We do not own your photos nor do we license it TO be sold.  Your photos are YOUR photos.  http://bit.ly/lE3v8i
@arthusandnico it's not fair.  we blogged about it at http://bit.ly/lE3v8i and how it relates to our service.
@RaDragon welcome.  :)  DM us i you need any help.  _SW
@raj6 Hi.  If you're sharing a photo from another site
column4: you need to include the source (via text or link) as part of your caption.

@saillog if you'd like to switch
column4: our service is transparent about what we do and what we don't.  Read up on it at http://bit.ly/lE3v8i
